member.name: T:PopupControl.PopupComboBox
member.summary: Represents a Windows combo box control with a custom popup control attached.

member.summary: Represents a pop-up window.

member.name: M:PopupControl.Popup.#ctor(System.Windows.Forms.Control)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The content of the pop-up.
member.remarks: Pop-up will be disposed immediately after disposion of the content control.

member.name: M:PopupControl.Popup.OnVisibleChanged(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the event.
member.param: An that contains the event data.

member.name: M:PopupControl.Popup.ProcessDialogKey(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)
member.summary: Processes a dialog box key.
member.param: One of the values that represents the key to process.
member.returns: true if the key was processed by the control; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:PopupControl.Popup.UpdateRegion
member.summary: Updates the pop-up region.

member.name: M:PopupControl.Popup.Show(System.Windows.Forms.Control)
member.summary: Shows the pop-up window below the specified control.
member.param: The control below which the pop-up will be shown.
member.remarks: When there is no space below the specified control, the pop-up control is shown above it.

member.name: M:PopupControl.Popup.Show(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Shows the pop-up window below the specified area of the specified control.
member.param: The control used to compute screen location of specified area.
The area of control below which the pop-up will be shown.
member.remarks: When there is no space below specified area, the pop-up control is shown above it.

member.name: M:PopupControl.Popup.Show(System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem)
member.summary: Shows the pop-up window below the specified ToolStripItem.
member.param: The ToolStripItem below which the pop-up will be shown.
member.remarks: When there is no space below specified ToolStripItem, the pop-up control is shown above it.
member.exception: or its Owner property is null.

member.name: P:PopupControl.Popup.Content
member.summary: Gets the content of the pop-up.

member.name: P:PopupControl.Popup.ShowingAnimation
member.summary: Determines which animation to use while showing the pop-up window.

member.name: P:PopupControl.Popup.HidingAnimation
member.summary: Determines which animation to use while hiding the pop-up window.

member.name: P:PopupControl.Popup.AnimationDuration
member.summary: Determines the duration of the animation.

member.name: P:PopupControl.Popup.FocusOnOpen
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the content should receive the focus after the pop-up has been opened.
member.value: true if the content should be focused after the pop-up has been opened; otherwise, false.
member.remarks: If the FocusOnOpen property is set to false, then pop-up cannot use the fade effect.

member.name: P:PopupControl.Popup.AcceptAlt
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether presing the alt key should close the pop-up.
member.value: true if presing the alt key does not close the pop-up; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:PopupControl.Popup.Resizable
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the is resizable.

member.name: P:PopupControl.Popup.MinimumSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a minimum size of the pop-up.
member.returns: An ordered pair of type representing the width and height of a rectangle.

member.name: P:PopupControl.Popup.MaximumSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a maximum size of the pop-up.
member.returns: An ordered pair of type representing the width and height of a rectangle.

member.name: P:PopupControl.Popup.CreateParams
member.summary: Gets parameters of a new window.
member.returns: An object of type used when creating a new window.

member.name: T:PopupControl.PopupAnimations
member.summary: Types of animation of the pop-up window.

member.name: F:PopupControl.PopupAnimations.None
member.summary: Uses no animation.

member.name: F:PopupControl.PopupAnimations.LeftToRight
member.summary: Animates the window from left to right. This flag can be used with roll or slide animation.

member.name: F:PopupControl.PopupAnimations.RightToLeft
member.summary: Animates the window from right to left. This flag can be used with roll or slide animation.

member.name: F:PopupControl.PopupAnimations.TopToBottom
member.summary: Animates the window from top to bottom. This flag can be used with roll or slide animation.

member.name: F:PopupControl.PopupAnimations.BottomToTop
member.summary: Animates the window from bottom to top. This flag can be used with roll or slide animation.

member.name: F:PopupControl.PopupAnimations.Center
member.summary: Makes the window appear to collapse inward if it is hiding or expand outward if the window is showing.

member.name: F:PopupControl.PopupAnimations.Slide
member.summary: Uses a slide animation.

member.name: F:PopupControl.PopupAnimations.Blend
member.summary: Uses a fade effect.

member.name: F:PopupControl.PopupAnimations.Roll
member.summary: Uses a roll animation.

member.name: F:PopupControl.PopupAnimations.SystemDefault
member.summary: Uses a default animation.
